lines.content: This is a project template for a greenfield Java project. It's named after the Java mascot _Duke_. Given below are instructions on how to use it.
Prerequisites: JDK 11, update Intellij to the most recent version.
1. Open Intellij (if you are not in the welcome screen, click `File` > `Close Project` to close the existing project first)
1. Open the project into Intellij as follows:
1. Select the project directory, and click `OK`.
1. If there are any further prompts, accept the defaults.
1. Configure the project to use **JDK 11** (not other versions) as explained in [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/help/idea/sdk.html#set-up-jdk).
In the same dialog, set the **Project language level** field to the `SDK default` option.

3. After that, locate the `src/main/java/duke.Duke.java` file, right-click it, and choose `Run duke.Duke.main()` (if the code editor is showing compile errors, try restarting the IDE). If the setup is correct, you should see something like the below as the output:
* Keeps track of tasks for user.
* Creates the Duke class to initialise program.
* Initialises the TaskList, Ui, and Storage.
* Main driver function for Duke program.
* Returns Duke bot response to input.
* An Exception class for Duke related problems.
* @param message The message to be shown when DukeException is caught.
* Returns the message from a DukeException.
* Command to add a Task to the TaskList.
* @param task The Task to be added.
* Task will be added to TaskList, data will be updated and saved, message will be printed to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
* @throws IOException If there is an error when updating the file.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws IOException {
* Command to end the Duke program.
* Command will be set to end the program.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Abstract class representing commands that Duke program can run.
* Each and every other command will inherit from Command super class.
* Executes the Task, data will be updated and saved, message will be printed to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
* @throws IOException If there is an error when updating the file.
public abstract String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws IOException;
* Sets the isEnd variable to true.
* Duke program will end upon variable being set to true.
* Checks if the command ends the program.
* Command to delete a Task from the TaskList.
* @param num The index of Task in TaskList to be deleted.
* Task will be deleted from TaskList, data will be updated and saved, message will be printed to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
* @throws IOException If there is an error when updating the file.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws IOException {
* Command that filters out TaskList and prints out those with matching keywords.
* Command will be set to filer TaskList to those that match keyword.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Command to list all Tasks in the TaskList.
* All the Tasks in TaskList will be printed out to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) {
* Command to mark a Task as completed.
* @param num The index of Task in TaskList to be marked as completed.
* Task will be updated to completed, data will be updated and saved, message will be printed to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
* @throws IOException If there is an error when updating the file.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws IOException {
* Command to mark a task as uncompleted.
* @param num The index of Task in TaskList to be marked as uncompleted.
* Task will be updated to uncompleted, data will be updated and saved, message will be printed to user.
* @param tasks The list that contains all the Tasks on the program.
* @param ui Deals with the interaction with user.
* @param storage Deals with the loading and updating of file.
* @return The String response of Duke after running command.
* @throws IOException If there is an error when updating the file.
public String run(TaskList tasks, Ui ui, Storage storage) throws IOException {

* the dialog container. Clears the user input after processing.

* @param tasks The list of Tasks currently in program.

throw new DukeException("The description of a todo cannot be empty.");

public static Command parse(String command) throws DukeException, DateTimeParseException {

* Returns enum Inputs which program can understand.
* @return An enum that the program understands.

* Prints out a line to user.

print("What can I do for you?");
* Returns the String exit message of Duke program.
return "Bye. Hope to see you again soon!";
* Returns a String containing all the Tasks at hand.
* @param tasks A list of all the Tasks at hand.
sb.append("Here are the tasks in your list:\n");
* Returns the String message that a Task has been added.

* Returns a String message that a Task was marked done.
* @param task The Task that has been marked.
* @return String message indicating the Task has been marked.
return String.format("Nice! I've marked this duke.task as done:\n %s", task.toString());
* Returns a String message that a Task was marked not done.
* @param task The Task that has been marked.
* @return String message indicating that Task has been unmarked.
return String.format("OK, I've marked this duke.task as not done yet:\n %s", task.toString());
* Returns a String message that Task has been deleted.

public String printDeleteTask(Task task, TaskList tasks) {
